cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Updated stunnel packages available for Red Hat Linux 7
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2020 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

note: Updated stunnel packages are available for Red Hat Linux 7.

When invoked in daemon mode (that is, without the -l or -f flags), stunnel
will attempt to log its process ID to a file in the /var/stunnel directory,
which does not exist.  This errata changes the default directory used for
PID files to /var/run.
